about_the_game:
"Boats N' Hoes" is an exhilarating combat game that immerses players in a thrilling world where boats serve as their means of traversal and hoes become their arsenal of weapons. As players navigate through various levels, they'll encounter a multitude of challenges, from fierce enemies to formidable bosses, all while striving to achieve the highest score and dominate the leaderboards.

In this dynamic gameplay experience, players must strategically choose from a diverse array of hoe unlocks, each offering additional advantages.

To progress and unlock more powerful hoes, players must not only demonstrate their combat prowess but also earn experience points (EXP) through successful battles and accomplishments. As they level up, new hoe types are gradually unlocked, providing players with even more options to tailor their combat style and adapt to increasingly challenging foes.

As players traverse the seas, they'll encounter epic boss battles that will test their skills and strategic thinking. These encounters will require players to utilize their arsenal of hoes to exploit each boss's weaknesses and emerge victorious.

With its addictive gameplay, vibrant visuals, and competitive leaderboards, "Boats N' Hoes" offers an exhilarating gaming experience that will keep players coming back for more as they strive to become the ultimate master of the seas.

Features:
1. Boats
2. Hoes
3. Hoe-based naval combat
4. Extra hoe slot unlocks
5. Hoe type upgrades
6. Steam Leaderboards

What more could you want?



BOATS N' HOES IS A WORK IN PROGRESS GAME, THE GAME WILL HAVE ADDITIONAL UPDATES AND FEATURES BASED ON PLAYER FEEDBACK.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3rd Gen / AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 / AMD R9 260
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD RX 5600-XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Boats N' Hoes is a combat game based around using boats as a player and hoes as a weapon type. Attack other boats with hoes and avoid their hoes to become the best, it's a hoe lot of fun!
